title: NeuroAI Models of Brain & Mind
description: Explore advanced models of human brain and behavior, review the field's progress, and assess current approaches' strengths and limitations. Engage in hands-on group projects developing computational models.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1315 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
